title: Corda Crypto Library Configuration Schema
description: Configuration schema for the crypto library subsection.

expireAfterAccessMins.description: Expiration time in minutes for cached key metadata

maximumSize.description: Maximum number of cached key metadata

maxAttempts.description: Maximum attempts to process a message

waitBetweenMills.description: Time between attempts in milliseconds, if the number of values is less than attempts then the last item is repeated

hsm.description: Settings and capabilities for the HSM

attemptTimeoutMills.description: Wait period in milliseconds between attempts, should be reasonably large as some operations may be long, e.g. RSA key generation by the SOFT HSM may take a few seconds

categories.description: Categories which the HSM can be used for

category.description: Category name, could be the wildcard * meaning all which has to be the last item if used

policy.description: Defines how private keys are generated for that category, ALIASED - stored in the HSM, WRAPPED - wrapped by the HSM, BOTH - decision is taken by the HSM at runtime

masterKeyPolicy.description: Wrapping key policy, NONE - no wrapping key is required, SHARED - wrapping key shared by all tenants, UNIQUE - wrapping key unique for each tenant

masterKeyAlias.description: If the masterKeyPolicy is SHARED then this specifies the alias of the shared key and as such is required

capacity.description: Number of keys which can be handled by the HSM, -1 means unlimited capacity

supportedSchemes.description: Key schemes that are supported by the HSM

wrappingKeys.description: Key derivation parameters for wrapping keys supplied in config

alias.description: The alias for the wrapping key.

algorithm.description: Key derivation function and wrapping key algorithm selection

salt.description: Salt for the key derivation function

passphrase.description: Passphrase for the key derivation function

defaultWrappingKey.description: The default wrapping key, which must be in the wrappingKeys array.
